trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows Forms check box that can be added to a Microsoft Office Word document.
trans-unit.target: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Word 文档的 Windows 窗体复选框。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> is different from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>不同于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> has additional members that enable it to be added to a Word document and that give it additional methods and properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>具有支持可将其添加到 Word 文档并，使其具有更多的方法和属性的其他成员。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the `New` constructor to create a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用`New`构造函数来创建一个新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlExtensions.AddCheckBox%2A> method to add a new <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> to a document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlExtensions.AddCheckBox%2A>方法添加新<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>到文档。

trans-unit.source: Activates the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 激活 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this method, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Activate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此方法的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Activate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Activate` method.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Activate`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the top edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的下边缘与该文档的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the top edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 以磅为单位，底部边缘之间的距离<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />文档的上边缘。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is equal to the sum of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A> property value and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Height%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值等于的总和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A>属性值和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Height%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses points, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用点，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用像素值。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Bottom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Bottom` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Bottom`属性。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a dynamically created <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> from the document and removes it from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从该文档中删除动态创建的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 并将其从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.ControlCollection" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used with a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> that is created programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅应该用于<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>，在运行时以编程方式创建。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you call this method on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> that is added to the document at design time.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用此方法引发异常<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>，它在设计时添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this method, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此方法的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Delete%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Delete` method.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Delete`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> in points.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的高度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Height%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A> property values cause the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Bottom%2A> property value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> to change.
trans-unit.target: 对所做更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Height%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A>属性值将导致<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Bottom%2A>属性值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses points, whereas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用点，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用像素值。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Height` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Height`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的基础 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 基础<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape" />的<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape> property enables you to get the exact position of the control on the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape>属性使您能够获得文档上控件的确切位置。

trans-unit.source: If the wrapping style of the control is not set to **In line with text**, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件的换行样式未设置为**与文本对齐**、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in points, between the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的左边缘与该文档的左边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, between the left edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 以磅为单位的左边缘之间的距离<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />和文档的左边的缘。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses points, whereas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用点，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用像素值。

trans-unit.source: You can only use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> control that is not in line with text.
trans-unit.target: 你只能使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>不与文本对齐的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Left%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Left` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Left`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in points, between the right edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的右边缘与该文档的左边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, between the right edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the left edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 以磅为单位的右边缘之间的距离<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />和文档的左边的缘。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Right%2A> property is equal to the sum of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Right%2A>属性等于的总和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Left%2A>属性值和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Width%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses points, whereas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用点，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用像素值。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Right%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Right` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Right`属性。

trans-unit.source: Selects the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Select?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Select?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Select` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Select`属性。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used and is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应使用，不支持。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Limitations of Windows Forms Controls on Office Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的 Windows 窗体控件 Office 文档上](/visualstudio/vsto/limitations-of-windows-forms-controls-on-office-documents.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的基础 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" /> of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 基础<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape" />的<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape> property enables you get the exact position of the control on the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape>属性使您可以获得文档上控件的确切位置。

trans-unit.source: If the wrapping style of the control is set to **In line with text**, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件的换行样式设置为**与文本对齐**、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape>属性返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in points, between the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the top edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的上边缘与该文档的上边缘之间的距离（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in points, between the top edge of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> and the top edge of the document.
trans-unit.target: 以磅为单位的上边缘之间的距离<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" />文档的上边缘。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses points, whereas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用点，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用像素值。

trans-unit.source: You can only use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> control that is not in line with text.
trans-unit.target: 你只能使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Top%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>不与文本对齐的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Top%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Top` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Top`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> in points.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> in points.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox" /> 的宽度（以磅为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Width%2A> and left property values cause the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Right%2A> property value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox> to change.
trans-unit.target: 对所做更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Width%2A>和 left 的属性值将导致<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Right%2A>属性值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox>更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses points, whereas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property uses pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.CheckBox.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用点，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性使用像素值。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls.Button.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: All controls in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls> namespace have a functionally equivalent `Width` property.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.Controls>命名空间具有在功能上等效`Width`属性。
